scripts.export-diagrams: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('child_process');const glob=require('glob');const path=require('path');const files=glob.sync('docs/diagrams/*.mmd');for(const f of files){const out=path.join('docs','diagrams','exported', path.basename(f, '.mmd')+'.svg');console.log('Export',f,'->',out);spawnSync('npx',['@mermaid-js/mermaid-cli','-i',f,'-o',out],{stdio:'inherit'});}console.log('Done');"
